ygData.subject: RE: Fashion First was Re: Hero bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: Watchman boots are silver plate. Draelon ... From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 12:52 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Watchman boots are silver plate.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 12:52 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Fashion First was Re: Hero bracer


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

Charred boots are a nice black plate look as well (Charred Boots: AC 6, +3
Agl, +5 HR, PR). I still need to get over to Rathe Mtns and look for
Petrifin for a granite bracer (gives black plat look I have been told).


>From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Fashion First was Re: Hero bracer
>Date: Tue, 15 Feb 2000 09:06:51 -0800 (PST)

>Hmm I guess it's the price you pay for such dainty, delicate frames ;P.
>
>I have gone back to black armor to wear with the two pieces of imbrued I
>have
>(greaves and one bracer). I now have a black enamelled breastplate - all
>fixed so
>that bards can wear it; there was a question for awhile. No stats but the
>AC 25 is
>very nice (I paid 1000 plat for it, by the way). For those of you tired of
>blue it
>is a nice alternative. I am also going to do the Watchman Boots quest in
>North
>Karana (I hear they look like black plate and they are AC5 +5 STA - much
>better than
>blackened iron boots) and the Hero Bracer quest (for the strength) to
>finish off the
>outfit.
>
>Fashion first brothers and sisters =).
>
>//Maravana Vireo
>//50 Bard of the Jus Divinum
>//Mithaniel Marr
